title: 63 Best Amazon Prime Day Fashion Deals You Can Still Shop Today
description: Before the sale ends tonight, snag everything your wardrobe is missing for up to 82 percent off.
excerpt: Before the sale ends tonight, snag everything your wardrobe is missing for up to 82 percent off.
text: If you've been waiting to shop Amazon Prime Big Deal Days, now is the time (as the two-day sale ends tonight, October 9). Amazon’s second Prime Day event this year includes steep discounts on everything from chic furniture to cozy outerwear, making it an ideal time to save big on great wardrobe additions.You may have to dig through pages and pages of products, but surprisingly, Amazon carries a chic selection of brands that includes not only affordable favorites like Madewell and Levi’s but also buzzy designer labels such as A.P.C. and Jacquemus. You just need to know where to look (and that’s where we come in). We’re seeing low, low prices on a range of high-end denim pieces, luxury bags, coveted workout sets, and so much more at the e-tailer. To help jumpstart your fall shopping, we scoured Amazon’s inventory and found the 63 best Prime Big Deal Days fashion deals worth snagging across nearly every category. html:
If you've been waiting to shop Amazon Prime Big Deal Days, now is the time (as the two-day sale ends tonight, October 9). Amazon’s second Prime Day event this year includes steep discounts on everything from chic furniture to cozy outerwear, making it an ideal time to save big on great wardrobe additions.

You may have to dig through pages and pages of products, but surprisingly, Amazon carries a chic selection of brands that includes not only affordable favorites like Madewell and Levi’s but also buzzy designer labels such as A.P.C. and Jacquemus. You just need to know where to look (and that’s where we come in). We’re seeing low, low prices on a range of high-end denim pieces, luxury bags, coveted workout sets, and so much more at the e-tailer.

To help jumpstart your fall shopping, we scoured Amazon’s inventory and found the 63 best Prime Big Deal Days fashion deals worth snagging across nearly every category. Scroll down to begin filling your cart.

Jump to:

  • The Best Amazon Prime Day Fashion Deals 2024
  • The Best Amazon Prime Day Shoe Deals 2024
  • The Best Amazon Prime Day Activewear Deals 2024
  • The Best Amazon Prime Day Denim Deals 2024
  • The Best Amazon Prime Day Bag Deals 2024
  • The Best Amazon Prime Day Jewelry Deals 2024
  • The Best Amazon Prime Day Intimates Deals 2024

The Best Amazon Prime Day Fashion Deals 2024

Amazon has so many steep discounts on seasonal favorites right now, including up to 70 percent off work-appropriate wear, slinky going-out dresses, airy basics, and everyday denim. If you’re looking to cover all your bases, these Prime Day fashion deals are not to be missed.

Levi’s Original Trucker Jacket

Now 41% Off

NIA Dominic Top

Now 50% Off

[BLANKNYC] Suede Blazer

Now 20% Off

The Best Amazon Prime Day Shoe Deals 2024

Prime Day is historically a stellar time to buy footwear, including buzzy sneakers and sandals. The e-tailer is currently offering a range of silhouettes for up to 66 percent off. Some of the finds include Reebok retro-inspired runners and even rugged cowboy boots from Matisse that are perfect for adopting the yeehaw agenda.

Reebok Premier Pump Paris Trainer Marathon Sneakers

Now 66% Off

The Best Amazon Prime Day Activewear Deals 2024

If your workout gear could use an upgrade, Amazon is slashing prices on tons of name-brand styles and bestselling hidden gems. For instance, you can score up to 46 percent off a classic Adidas sports dress or flirty Baleaf skirt to nail the tenniscore aesthetic. Or, if you’re looking to build out your collection of basics, these viral workout leggings have over 36,000 five-star reviews and are under $25.

The Gym People Thick High Waist Yoga Pants with Pockets

The Best Amazon Prime Day Denim Deals 2024

Prime Day typically sees stellar discounts on heritage denim brands like Levi’s, as well as popular contemporary labels like 7 For All Mankind, Pistola Denim, and DL1961. Even better, a handful of their styles, from laidback jumpsuits and cropped jeans, are all under $250 at the e-tailer.

The Best Amazon Prime Day Jewelry Deals 2024

Elly Leavitt is a fashion and luxury commerce editor at Hearst covering fashion, design, and more across multiple brands. You can probably find her in line at Trader Joe's. You will never find her at SoulCycle.

Tatjana Freund is Hearst's Fashion & Luxury Commerce Editor, covering beauty, fashion and more across multiple brands. Previously, she worked at ELLE.com and Marie Claire. She's a fan of whiskey neat, podcasts that give her nightmares, and one time Zoë Kravitz laughed at a joke she made.
